text: Ba jod or (ej Pajomʙar), Alloh dar xoʙ miqdori dusmanonatro ʙa tu kam nison dod. Pas mu'minonro ʙa in xaʙar dodi, dilason quvvat pajdo kard va ʙar cangi onho casorat pajdo kardand. Agar sumorai onhoro ʙisjor nison medod, az tars notavon mesuded va dar tasmim ʙa cang ʙa nizo' (ixtilof) ʙarmexosted, vale Alloh sumoro az dusmanon dar amon dost, ki U ʙa on ci dar dilhost, ogoh ast
